title: Check Your Homework in 10 Seconds!
description: Upload your handwritten homework, and TekserAI will check, grade, and score it!
solution: TekserAI is the perfect solution for teachers looking to streamline the grading process and focus on what truly matters – teaching and inspiring students.
uploadHomework: Upload your homework and receive comprehensive feedback and grading within minutes.
uploadHandwrittenHomework: Upload your handwritten homework, and our AI will check it for you!
guideIntro: If you haven’t used our service before we highly encourage you to go through the short guide. It only takes a couple of seconds.
uploadGoodImages: Make sure you upload good images.
qualityChecker: For a quality homework checker, you need to upload quality images.
chooseDetails: Don't forget to choose your subject, class, and teacher's level of kindness.
